flawed_nl_solution:
There are 15 - 6 = <<15-6=9>>9 students who like French fries only.
There are 10 - 6 = <<10-6=7>>7 students who like burgers only.
So, 9 + 7 + 6 = <<9+7+6=22>>22 students like either French fries, burgers, or both.
Hence, 25 - 22 = <<25-22=3>>3 students do not like either fries or burgers.
